SchoolPlatform Executive Summary

The investment opportunity at a glance. MVP ready • Market proven • Capital needed for scale.

01

The Problem

Traditional education is broken

  • No incentive for peer collaboration
  • Centralized credentials easily faked
  • No economic rewards for learning
  • Limited transparency in assessment
$400B+ Global EdTech Market
02

Our Solution

Blockchain-powered education platform

  • Token rewards for learning and teaching
  • NFT certificates, tamper-proof
  • Peer review system with economic incentives
  • Complete transparency and trust
100% MVP Complete
03

Market Opportunity

Art education + blockchain early stage

  • $50B+ art education market globally
  • Premium pricing ($100-500+ per course)
  • Tech-savvy creative professionals
  • High willingness to pay for quality
20% Annual Market Growth
04

Product Status

Production-ready MVP deployed

  • Django + React full-stack platform
  • Polygon blockchain integration
  • Smart contracts tested on testnet
  • Scalable architecture for millions
18 Months Development
05

Business Model

Multiple revenue streams proven

  • Course sales commission (60%)
  • Premium features subscription (25%)
  • Marketplace transaction fees (15%)
  • Institutional licensing
$50 ARPU Year 1 Target
06

Competitive Edge

First-mover advantage secured

  • 18+ month head start on competitors
  • Complete tech stack developed
  • Zero technical debt
  • Focused art education vertical
0 Direct Competitors
